title: Job Finder
description: A job finding mobile app that allows users to seamlessly search and apply for jobs.

title: Travel Tracker
description: An interactive travel info app providing details about hotels, restaurants, and special attractions for any location.

title: Live Chat App
description: A live chat application that uses sockets for seamless communication and instant message delivery.

title: Soccer Trivia Game & API
description: A trivia game akin to wordle where the player must guess a current EPL player.

title: AI Investment Advisor
description: An AI chatbot that automates investment analysis, enhancing efficiency for investment professionals.

title: Study Buddy
description: A productivity app for Android that helps users schedule tasks and minimize distractions by blocking other apps on their phones.

title: Arbitrage Finder
description: An application for finding the best betting odds for upcoming matchups across various sports leagues. The platform identifies any arbitrage oppurtunities.
